name: InnerMind
description:
InnerMind was created during the Dawson Game Jam 2016, by Chronoblast Games.

The theme for the game jam was "Worldless Worlds"; we weren't allowed to use any text in our games.

It was a blast creating the game; it was a abit rushed (made the entire game during the last day) and there are still some bugs but it is still playable.

I was very inspired by Antichamber and Portal.

Controls:

WASD: To Move

Mouse: To Look

E: To Interact

www.chronoblastgames.com
